Vegan Pesto Pasta with Charred Broccoli. Easy Vegan Pesto with Ziti, served with roasted cherry tomatoes and charred broccoli. 21 gm of protein! Vegan Soyfree Recipe.

This pesto pasta is perfect for any time you have access to fresh basil or other fresh herbs/greens. Process with seeds or nuts, add some flavors, serve with pasta of choice. Add a fun twist like roasted broccoli or cauliflower, roasted cherry tomatoes, or other veggies.

recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups spinach (, or baby kale, chard or cilantro or more basil)
2 tbsp pecans,  (or use almonds, cashews, more sunflower seeds, hemp seeds)
zest of half a lemon (, or use lemon juice to taste)
black pepper, red pepper flakes or other flavor additions
12 to 14 oz Ziti  (or other pasta, gluten-free if needed)
1 cup or more grape or cherry tomatoes
2 cloves of minced garlic or 1/2 tsp garlic powder

recipeInstructions.text: Add basil, spinach, sunflower seeds, pecans, garlic, salt, nutritional yeast, lemon zest to a food processor. Process until a coarse mixture. Add oil and a tbsp or so water. and process again. Add more water if needed to make a homogeneous mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Add basil, spinach, sunflower seeds, pecans, garlic, salt, nutritional yeast, lemon zest to a food processor. Process until a coarse mixture. Add oil and a tbsp or so water. and process again. Add more water if needed to make a homogeneous mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions on the package. Drain and Mix the pesto with the pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to instructions on the package. Drain and Mix the pesto with the pasta.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a large baking dish. Slice the cherry tomatoes and place in the dish. Sprinkle some salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a large baking dish. Slice the cherry tomatoes and place in the dish. Sprinkle some salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Add broccoli to a bowl. Drizzle oil and lemon over the broccoli. Cover and shake to coat. Add the garlic, pepper flakes, salt, shake again and spread in the baking dish which has the cherry tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add broccoli to a bowl. Drizzle oil and lemon over the broccoli. Cover and shake to coat. Add the garlic, pepper flakes, salt, shake again and spread in the baking dish which has the cherry tomatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 410 degrees F (210 C) for 18 to 22 minutes. then broil for a min. Add the roasted broccoli and tomatoes to the pesto pasta and serve. Garnish with black pepper, vegan parm (optional).
